attr.title: Elsewhere in the Night
attr.desc: A 2D psychic noir point-and-click adventure where you play as Lady Tick Tock, a detective who speaks to the dead to solve a string of murders in a dystopian city. With EGA-inspired pixel art and a narrative-focused design free of arcade sequences or dead-ends, the game offers a gripping story you can explore at your own pace.
attr.inst: Download the Elsewhere in the Night.rar version for free at itch.io (https://cosmicvoid.itch.io/elsewhere-in-the-night). Extract the .rar, and copy the Elsewhere in the Night.pck file to this port's gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Download the *Elsewhere in the Night.rar* version for free at [itch.io](https://cosmicvoid.itch.io/elsewhere-in-the-night). Extract the *.rar*, and copy the *Elsewhere in the Night.pck* file to this port's *gamedata* folder.
